1. Changed EC2 instance type to d2.4xlarge from a1.xlarge. This will provide higher performance on both webserver and application servers
2. Added another RDS read replica. This will provide enhanced read performance and increased availability
3. Elastic Load Balancer and CloudWatch were already added in the first estimate. CloudWatch will provide metrics to continuously monitor the resources.
